title: Marlo Dahl
text:
Marlo Dahl (born October 21, 1972 in <a href="Nipigon">Nipigon</a>, <a href="Ontario">Ontario</a>) is a <a href="Canadians">Canadian</a> <a href="curling">curler</a> and singer. Dahl skips a team on the Women's <a href="World%20Curling%20Tour">World Curling Tour</a> representing the <a href="Port%20Arthur%20Curling%20Club">Port Arthur Curling Club</a> in <a href="Thunder%20Bay%2C%20Ontario">Thunder Bay</a>.
Dahl is a perennial skip at the <a href="Ontario%20Scotties%20Tournament%20of%20Hearts">Ontario Scotties Tournament of Hearts</a>. She has played in six provincial championships, including 2006, 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013. She has played in three World Curling Tour events in her career, the <a href="2006%20Labatt%20Cash%20Spiel">2006 Labatt Cash Spiel</a>, the <a href="2012%20Courtesy%20Freight%20Northern%20Ontario%20Superspiel">2012 Courtesy Freight Northern Ontario Superspiel</a> and the <a href="2012%20Molson%20Cash%20Spiel">2012 Molson Cash Spiel</a>.
Outside of curling, Dahl is a Catholic school teacher at St. Edward Elementary in Nipigon. She is also a singer in the band "Thunder Bay Legends", which impersonates famous singers. Dahl, an <a href="Ojibwe">Ojibwe</a>, is a member of the <a href="Nipigon%20First%20Nation">Nipigon First Nation</a> and is fluent in the <a href="Ojibwe%20language">Ojibwe language</a> and <a href="Oji-Cree">Oji-Cree</a>.
